title: Ports for Portfowarding?
body: Hey what are the ports for portfowarding oceanic league of legends

replies.body:
TCP Ports: 80, 443, 2099, 5222-5223, 8393-8400
UDP Ports: 5000-5500

Hyphens indicate ranged ports.

[Sauce.](http://portforward.com/english/applications/port_forwarding/publishers/Riot_Games.htm)

No problem.

Just out of curiousity, could you tell me what effect it has on your game, if any at all? I have a connection where it is incapable of port forwarding and I'd like to know exactly what I'm missing out on.
